CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn down for softer look, up for crisper edges. Default: 50%.
CONTROLS.NAME: sharpness

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn up to decrease diameter of tunnel, constricting it, or turn down to make it wider. Default: 50%.
CONTROLS.NAME: constriction

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn up for noisier tunnel, or all the way down for just the smooth geometric tunnel, no cloud-like noise.
CONTROLS.NAME: noise

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn up to change it from a tunnel to just two planes. Once it is planes, try playing with the 'twist' slider.
CONTROLS.NAME: planes_only

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Determines how much the bass will make you travel forward. Default: 25%.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_in

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add a twist to the tunnel's geometry.
CONTROLS.NAME: twist

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add a spin to the camera, forward for clockwise. Default: 50%.
CONTROLS.NAME: spin
